trans-unit.source: Appears as the root of the visual subtree generated for a group.
trans-unit.target: 显示为组生成的可视子树的根。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，这意味着，它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 一个映像或一个面板） 的单个对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> 类。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: 父级中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> 应用来排列自身及其子元素的最终区域。

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 排列 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> 的内容。

trans-unit.source: The actual sized used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> 使用的实际大小。

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 在应用新模板时生成 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> 的可视化树。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem.OnApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 每当应用程序代码或内部进程（如重新生成布局处理过程）调用 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem.OnApplyTemplate%2A> 方法时，均会调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> object for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> object for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Clears all property associations.
trans-unit.target: 清除所有的属性关联。

trans-unit.source: The associated item.
trans-unit.target: 关联的项。

trans-unit.source: The associated property.
trans-unit.target: 关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: Removes the association between the specified item and property.
trans-unit.target: 删除指定项和属性之间的关联。

trans-unit.source: The property to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的属性。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified property from all property lists.
trans-unit.target: 从所有属性列表中删除指定属性。

trans-unit.source: The item that has the specified property associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 具有与之关联的指定属性的项。

trans-unit.source: The property whose value to return.
trans-unit.target: 将返回其值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the specified property that is associated with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 返回与指定项关联的指定属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified property that is associated with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 与指定项关联的指定属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The item to associate the value and property with.
trans-unit.target: 要将值和属性与其相关联的项。

trans-unit.source: The property that is associated with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 与指定的项相关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the associated property.
trans-unit.target: 相关联的属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Stores the specified property and value and associates them with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 存储指定的属性和值，并将它们与指定的项相关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the sizes of the control's viewport and cache.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示控件视区和缓存的大小的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the sizes of the control's viewport and cache.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件的视区和缓存大小的对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the desired size of the control's header.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示控件标头所需大小的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the desired size of the control's header.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件的标头所需大小的对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control's layout pass occurs at a lower priority.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示控件的布局传递是否出现在较低优先级中的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control's layout pass occurs at a lower priority; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件的布局通行出现在较低优先级，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the desired size of the control's items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示控件项的所需大小的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the desired size of the control's items.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件项所需大小的对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> that displays the items of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取显示控件的项的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> that displays the items of the control.
trans-unit.target: 显示控件的项的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the owning <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> should virtualize its items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示所属 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 是否应虚拟化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the owning <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> should virtualize its items; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果拥有的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 应虚拟化其项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> 接口时使用。
